monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Transforms player into a ball - Allows to traverse narrow corridors
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Anti Cascade
skills.description: Reduces enemy damage by 3% for every consecutive hit. (1st hit: 0% reduction, 2nd hit: 3% reduction, 3rd hit: 6% reduction)

skills.name: Arcane Barrage
skills.description: 10 x 65% (650%) magical damage (neutral) Shield self for 1 x (750 + 200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Arcane Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) magical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Assistance
skills.description: Every heal that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 10% chance to apply Sidekick (Buff).

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Barricade
skills.description: Every shield that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 4% chance to apply Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Buff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Channeled Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (400 + 40% Magic + 40% Max Mana) Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Counterfeit
skills.description: Uses the last action used by target enemy.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Base
skills.description: Increases Critical Chance by 15% while wearing no equipment that increases Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Death Blow
skills.description: Deals 5% increased damage for each Debuff on the target.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Debuff Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects reduced by 50%

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Encapsulate
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (40 + 15% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (80% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (50 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (100% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (60 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (120% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (70 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (150% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 9 x (90 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Fatal Cut
skills.description: 2 x 160% (320%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt, applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Hexed Touch
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply a random Debuff on the attacker.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Imitate
skills.description: Uses the last action used by target ally.

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Long Slash
skills.description: 1 x 160% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Long Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Long Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Neutral Weakness
skills.description: Neutral damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Observe
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, shield all Monsters in the party by 50% of this Monster's defense.

skills.name: Power
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Power Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Power Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Restoring Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (50 + 15% Defense) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (60 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (75 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (100 + 15% Defense) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield target for 7 x (125 + 15% Defense) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Sidekick Support
skills.description: Unique Aura: Healing, Shield and Buffing actions are now also affected by Sidekick Buff - triggering additional heals (40% magic), shields (40% defense) or buffs.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Variety
skills.description: Every attack deals 15% increased damage when used for the first time during combat. (Different levels count as same attack)

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

drops.name: Cookie Mushroom
drops.description: Increases damage, healing and shielding of this monster by 3%.

drops.name: Skill Resetter
drops.description: Resets the skilltree of a Monster
